Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 59th, Racine, 55th and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 59th, Racine, 55th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th

Allow extra travel time.
